details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 14289-2:202x - 8.9 Annotations - 8.9.2.4 Annotation types - File attachment annotation
details.description: When a file attachment annotation references a file specification dictionary, the file specification dictionary shall include an AFRelationship entry

rule.description: When a file attachment annotation references a file specification dictionary, the file specification dictionary shall include an AFRelationship entry

error.message: The file specification dictionary referenced by a file attachment annotation does not include AFRelationship entry
